channel.title: Mix on michalsn
channel.description: Recent content in Mix on michalsn

item.title: CodeIgniter 4 + Mix with versioning
item.description: Last time I showed you how to easily integrate Mix with CodeIgniter 4. This time we’ll complete the integration process by implementing a helper which will make using versioned assets very convenient and easy.

item.title: CodeIgniter 4 + Mix
item.description: Today we are going to look at configuring CodeIgniter 4 in conjunction with Mix. Mix is one of the components that comes with the Laravel framework.
